articles.author: Pascal Rossignol, Layli Foroudi, Michel Rose
articles.title: Teacher fatally stabbed in school attack in northern France - Reuters
articles.description: A knifeman fatally stabbed a teacher and wounded two other people in an attack at a school in the northern France city of Arras on Friday and the investigatio…
articles.content: ARRAS, Oct 13 (Reuters) - A knifeman fatally stabbed a teacher and wounded two other people in an attack at a school in the northern France city of Arras on Friday and the investigation was handed to… [+4353 chars]
